Store of value implies both:  - wealth (purchasing power) is maintained or increased over time - wealth cannot be seized or censored (storage)  Hodling Bitcoin is thus *using* Bitcoin for its advertised properties.  Every Bitcoin hodler thus qualifies as a daily active user.
